DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Creates a route that lines up with the first point of the runway at an appropriate altitude, and descends as it approaches the runway. Flies the aircraft on that route and then lands the plane using an animation sequence to describe the motion.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>runway</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Runway</myLabel> <myToolTip>A route identifying the location and extent of the runway. Two points are sufficient.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Routes</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtRoutesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
